Starice heard the scream and ran where Azure Blade was.
"Are you ok?"said the femme to Azure Blade"By the Matrix!, What 
happened here???"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> The blast threw AzureBlade back. His armor, already battered, took 
> more damage. He had not been in the immediate radius, but it shook 
him 
> nonetheless.
> AzureBlade: AAARGHHHHHHHH!!!!!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
